Daly_City.Ulloa and 15th Avenue station:
Ulloa and 15th Avenue a light rail stop on the Muni Metro L Taraval line, located in the Parkside neighborhood of San Francisco, California. The station opened with the first section of the L Taraval line on April 12, 1919 and was closed in 2017.


== Closure ==
Like many stations on the line, Ulloa and 15th Avenue had no platforms; trains stopped at marked poles on 15th Avenue, and passengers crossed the parking lane to board.
